obfuscation: ﻿It is broadly agreed that English is our second language in Sweden .
original: ﻿It is generally agreed that English is our second language in Sweden.

obfuscation: Almost any Swede is able to communicate in English .
original: Almost any Swede is able to communicate in English.

obfuscation: As a matter of fact , we are highly pendent on English for communicating with the rest of the world .
original: As a matter of fact, we are highly dependent on English for communicating with the rest of the world.

obfuscation: However , I think it is important to try that there is a big difference between the younger and the elder generation .
original: However, I think it is important to stress that there is a big difference between the younger and the elder generation.

obfuscation: I have been studying and using the English language for a retentive time , more exactly since the fourth grade of elementary school .
original: I have been studying and using the English language for a long time, more exactly since the fourth grade of elementary school.

obfuscation: In this essay I will try to evaluate my own strengths and weaknesses in the four skills of speaking , writing , listening and reading .
original: In this essay I will try to evaluate my own strengths and weaknesses in the four skills of speaking, writing, listening and reading.

obfuscation: Although I have been studying English for such a retentive time , I still do not feel comfortable when I speak it .
original: Although I have been studying English for such a long time, I still do not feel comfortable when I speak it.

obfuscation: There are respective reasons why I feel this way .
original: There are several reasons why I feel this way.

obfuscation: Firstly , I am not a lifelike speaker .
original: Firstly, I am not a natural speaker.

obfuscation: I have constantly been quite a silent person in bigger groups .
original: I have always been quite a silent person in bigger groups.

obfuscation: To give a speech in front of an audience is not comfortable .
original: To give a speech in front of an audience is not easy.

obfuscation: Secondly , after two years of French at the university it seems to me like my head is all filled with French grammar , French words and French pronunciation .
original: Secondly, after two years of French at the university it seems to me like my head is all filled with French grammar, French words and French pronunciation.

obfuscation: ultimately , I have not spent much time in English-speaking countries .
original: Finally, I have not spent much time in English-speaking countries.

obfuscation: I am well aware that I want more practise if I want my English to become fluid .
original: I am well aware that I need more practise if I want my English to become fluid.

obfuscation: Therefore I are planning a trip to England this summer .
original: Therefore I am planning a trip to England this summer.

obfuscation: On the other hand I find that I write English better than I speak it .
original: On the other hand I feel that I write English better than I speak it.

obfuscation: When you write you can take all the time that you need and besides you can constantly rely on dictionaries and grammars when you find it necessary .
original: When you write you can take all the time that you need and besides you can always rely on dictionaries and grammars when you find it necessary.

obfuscation: That suits me perfectly .
original: That suits me perfectly.

obfuscation: After four years at the university , I am also quite familiar with the process of creating and structuring thoughts and ideas on paper .
original: After four years at the university, I am also quite familiar with the process of creating and structuring thoughts and ideas on paper.

obfuscation: One thing that I find difficult when I write English is to find the adequate words and phrases .
original: One thing that I find difficult when I write English is to find the adequate words and phrases.

obfuscation: Though the problem is easily solved by having a full dictionary within reach while writing .
original: Though the problem is easily solved by having a good dictionary within reach while writing.

obfuscation: Another thing that much bothers me is the English spelling , but maybe it is only a question of practice .
original: Another thing that often bothers me is the English spelling, but maybe it is only a question of practice.

obfuscation: In our everyday life we listen to English all the time without even thinking about it .
original: In our everyday life we listen to English all the time without even thinking about it.

obfuscation: We watch English and American programs on television and we listen to music with English lyrics .
original: We watch English and American programs on television and we listen to music with English lyrics.

obfuscation: When we go to the cinema it is much to see an American movie .
original: When we go to the cinema it is often to see an American movie.

obfuscation: My opinion is that this is the reason why listening to English seems thus easy to me .
original: My opinion is that this is the reason why listening to English seems so easy to me.

obfuscation: In early words , it has been a part of my everyday life for such a long time that I do not even think about it any more .
original: In other words, it has been a part of my everyday life for such a long time that I do not even think about it any more.

obfuscation: Since I started this semester I have noticed that I listen more carefully when I hear English .
original: Since I started this semester I have noticed that I listen more carefully when I hear English.

obfuscation: Nowadays I am more focused and concentrated while listening .
original: Nowadays I am more focused and concentrated while listening.

obfuscation: I pay much more attention to what they actually state , what expressions and words they use and how they pronounce it .
original: I pay much more attention to what they actually say, what expressions and words they use and how they pronounce it.

obfuscation: One of my main interests is literature .
original: One of my main interests is literature.

obfuscation: During my spare time I like to read novels and short stories .
original: During my spare time I like to read novels and short stories.

obfuscation: I consider reading very significant , and I think that children should be encouraged to read fiction at an early stage .
original: I consider reading very important, and I think that children should be encouraged to read fiction at an early stage.

obfuscation: What is significant is not what kind of literature you read .
original: What is important is not what kind of literature you read.

obfuscation: On the adverse , everyone should be allowed to choose according to his or her own taste .
original: On the contrary, everyone should be allowed to choose according to his or her own taste.

obfuscation: The significant thing is that you read instead of spending all your time in front of the television or the computer .
original: The important thing is that you read instead of spending all your time in front of the television or the computer.

obfuscation: The alone thing that troubles me when I read an English text is that I do not understand all the words .
original: The only thing that troubles me when I read an English text is that I do not understand all the words.

obfuscation: It is clear that my vocabulary is not sufficient .
original: It is clear that my vocabulary is not sufficient.

obfuscation: The English language appears to be so rich in words !
original: The English language seems to be so rich in words!

obfuscation: I come across fresh ones all the time .
original: I come across new ones all the time.

obfuscation: In most cases I understand the approximate meaning of the word by looking at the context .
original: In most cases I understand the approximate meaning of the word by looking at the context.

obfuscation: But most of the time I am eager to find away the exact definition .
original: But most of the time I am eager to find out the exact definition.

obfuscation: Therefore I try to look up all new lyrics in the dictionary .
original: Therefore I try to look up all new words in the dictionary.

obfuscation: It is not easy to evaluate your own strengths and weaknesses in an objective manner .
original: It is not easy to evaluate your own strengths and weaknesses in an objective way.

obfuscation: At least , I made an attempt .
original: At least, I made an attempt.

obfuscation: During this semester I hope that I will better my capacity in the four skills of speaking , writing , listening and reading in order to become a better communicator in English .
original: During this semester I hope that I will improve my capacity in the four skills of speaking, writing, listening and reading in order to become a better communicator in English.
